description: The world's first culturally-intelligent trust scoring system specifically designed for Filipino values and community structures

cultural_factors.label: Kapwa Network Strength
cultural_factors.description: Measures the strength of shared identity connections and community integration

cultural_factors.label: Bayanihan Community Spirit
cultural_factors.description: Evaluates active participation in community cooperation and mutual aid

components.name: crisis_response_history
components.description: History of helping community during crises

cultural_factors.label: Utang na Loob (Debt of Gratitude)
cultural_factors.description: Measures reliability in fulfilling reciprocal obligations and maintaining relationship bonds

components.name: obligation_fulfillment
components.description: Track record of fulfilling reciprocal obligations

components.name: gratitude_expression
components.description: Appropriate recognition and expression of gratitude

cultural_factors.label: Traditional Financial Factors
cultural_factors.description: Conventional financial metrics adapted for Filipino context

components.name: payment_history
components.description: Track record of bill payments and financial obligations

components.name: savings_behavior
components.description: Evidence of financial planning and saving habits

risk_categories.name: Excellent
risk_categories.description: Exceptional community trust and financial reliability

risk_categories.name: Very Good
risk_categories.description: Strong cultural integration with good financial standing

risk_categories.name: Good
risk_categories.description: Solid community connections with moderate financial profile

risk_categories.name: Fair
risk_categories.description: Developing community trust with basic financial stability

risk_categories.name: Needs Development
risk_categories.description: Limited community integration requiring support and mentoring

calculation_steps: Collect cultural factor inputs from user assessment
Apply community validation multipliers based on regional data
Calculate weighted component scores using cultural factor weights
Apply contextual adjustments for life circumstances
Generate final KapwaScore and risk category classification

explanation_components: Cultural factor breakdown with specific contributions
